message: Who would be interested in a once a month gathering of RPG lovers?  For as to play games and chat games and enjoy company of other RPG friends?  We would like to build up the RPG community.  So whos with me?!
Hooray! I'm so excited that this is happening!
Sounds good to me. Currently playing Resonance of Fate (Which is an RPG, of course).
I agree with Aristeia.  There's only so much jrpg-ness I can handle before I want to start murdering spiky-haired children.

hehehe... i would support the murdering of spikey haired children.  but i would still love the JRPGs.  I am thinking it will be less about a certain game or style and more about a gathering of peeps for the purpose of spreading the faith of RPG-edness
I am so in this base.  Definitely an awesome idea.
The realism of JRPGs and lame puberty jokes definitely gets to you eventually. That is where Mass Effect comes in.
Nax, your opinion on this matter is the womb from which all truth springs.
if there are springs in wombs, there is something wrong...
depends on the time: friday or thursdays probably work best for me :D though I can't come on Thursday nights only mornings to late afternoon (5PM)
